metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46872 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Nim before 1.6.2. The RST module of the Nimlanguage stdlib, as used in NimForum and other products, permits thejavascript: URI scheme and thus can lead to XSS in some applications. (Nimversions 1.6.2 and later are fixed; there may be backports of the fix tosome earlier versions. NimForum 2.2.0 is fixed.)

criterions.comment: nim package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
